short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Klaaryo Chrome extension allow you to perform klaaryo actions from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supercharge your recruiting efforts with Klaaryo!
Our extension bridges the gap between LinkedIn and Klaaryo, synchronizing your activities for maximum productivity. Automate your LinkedIn messages, stay organized, and ensure you never miss a candidate!
